name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー正門

description: The massive main gate of Enies Lobby, guarded by two giants, Kashii and Oimo. This gate serves as the primary entrance to the Judicial Island and represents the first major obstacle for anyone attempting to invade the World Government facility. The gate features enormous doors that require tremendous strength to open.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Solo Assault Begins
keyEvents.description: Luffy charges through the main gate area, overwhelming the Marine forces stationed there in his determination to rescue Robin.
keyEvents.significance: The main gate becomes the site of the opening assault of the Enies Lobby rescue mission.

keyEvents.title: Allied Forces Arrive
keyEvents.description: The Franky Family and Galley-La Company arrive at the main gate to support the rescue mission.
keyEvents.significance: Transforms the gate into a full-scale battlefield where former enemies unite for a common cause.

keyEvents.title: Giant Gatekeepers Kashii and Oimo Appear
keyEvents.description: The two giant guardians of the main gate reveal themselves, presenting a formidable obstacle to the invading forces.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the main gate as a heavily defended position that requires more than brute force to overcome.

keyEvents.title: Kashii Defeated at the Gate
keyEvents.description: Through combined efforts of the allied forces and the King Bulls Sodom and Gomorrah, one of the giant gatekeepers is successfully brought down.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the first major victory for the rescue party and proves that teamwork can overcome seemingly insurmountable obstacles.

statusHistory.reason: Main gate is operational and defended during the assault
